summary: Cyber threat hunter with leadership experience building analytics pipelines and mentoring junior analysts.
Digital forensics specialist focused on cloud breach investigations, malware triage, and coordinated incident response.
Security engineer automating secure SDLC checks, triaging SAST/DAST output, and coaching developers on secure design.
Policy analyst supporting SOC 2 audits, supplier assessments, and risk remediation playbooks across SaaS products.
Security operations analyst focused on tuning SIEM alerts and responding to phishing escalations.
IT generalist administering Windows servers, handling help desk tickets, and coordinating hardware refresh projects.
Cloud platform engineer designing infrastructure as code deployments and managing CI/CD for SaaS products.
Penetration tester performing red team engagements, social engineering campaigns, and reporting on vulnerabilities.
Compliance manager with experience leading ISO 27001 certification programs and vendor assessments across global enterprises.
Security data scientist who built anomaly detection models and automated alert triage workflows integrated with Splunk dashboards.
